text:
@realDonaldTrump Especially if it will rid us of having @realDonaldTrump, #LiarInChief, #IdiotInChief, #ClimateChange & #CoronavirusPandemic denier in the @WhiteHouse.
Our country is not a reality TV show.
The #Coronavirus is immune to YOUR Lies & Platitudes
77,058 #American Deaths on YOUR watch!
